actions.description: The dolphin makes two Dazzling Slam attacks.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) bludgeoning damage plus 7 (2d6) psychic damage, and the target is blinded until the start of the dolphin's next turn.
actions.name: Dazzling Slam

specialTraits.description: The dolphin can hold its breath for 20 minutes.
specialTraits.name: Hold Breath
